CustomField.description: Reporting Use 01 = Name 02 = Billing Street 03 = Billing City 04 = Billing State 05 = Billing Postal Code 06 = Billing Country 07 = Phone 08 = Fax 09 = Ownership 10 = Industry Group 11 = Industry Umbrella
CustomField.formula: Subject__r.Name + '|01|' + Subject__r.BillingStreet + '|02|' + Subject__r.BillingCity + '|03|' + Subject__r.BillingState + '|04|' + Subject__r.BillingPostalCode + '|05|' + Subject__r.BillingCountry + '|06|' + Subject__r.Phone + '|07|' + Subject__r.Fax + '|08|' + TEXT(Subject__r.Ownership) + '|09|' + Subject__r.Industry_Group_REPORTING__c + '|10|' + Subject__r.Industry_Umbrella_REPORTING__c + '|11|' + TEXT(Subject__r.Type) + '|12|' + Subject__r.Website + '|13|'
CustomField.label: Report Subject Fields
